attributes.action: debate, in Parliament, any e-Petitions receiving more than 100,000 votes and draft a law for Parliamentary vote any e-Petition receiving more than 1 million votes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The intent of this petition is to ensure that this website is actually used by the PM and not just to enable a claim of 'I listen to the people' to be made.
